confirm.header:
If you unlock [color=title]Fright[/color], you will lose access to the [color=title]Hologram[/color] skill.
Later upgrades to [color=title]Fright[/color] will make enemies flee at [color=title]greater speeds[/color] for [color=title]longer durations[/color]. The highest upgrade adds a satisfying, combustible side effect to the skill.

receipt.footer: You will no longer have access to the [color=title]Hologram[/color] skill.

texts.overview: The starter upgrade to [color=title]Fright[/color] lengthens the effect's [color=title]duration[/color] and increases the speed at which enemies [color=title]flee[/color] your location.
texts.specs: Enemies flee for [color=title]2.5s[/color] (+1.0s) Enemies flee at [color=title]125%[/color] speed (+25%) Recharges in [color=title]21.0s[/color] (-4.0s)

texts.overview: [color=title]Fright[/color]'s final upgrade sets the highest possible [color=title]duration[/color] and [color=title]flee speed[/color]. Any given enemy now stands a chance to [color=title]spontaneously explode[/color] in pure terror when you use [color=title]Fright[/color].
texts.specs: Enemies flee for [color=title]3.0s[/color] (+0.5s) Enemies flee at [color=title]150%[/color] speed (+25%) Recharges in [color=title]18.0s[/color] (-3.0s) Chance to spontaneously explode at [color=title]15%[/color]

confirm.footer: Doing so will fully upgrade your [color=title]Fright[/color] skill.

texts.overview: Unlocking [color=dim]Fright[/color]'s final upgrade earned you the highest [color=title]duration[/color] and [color=title]flee speed[/color]. Also, each enemy now stands a chance to [color=title]spontaneously explode[/color] in pure terror when you use [color=title]Fright[/color].
